Token.Abstract: Subclass of NSOperation that is used for communication with the server.
block of type MSAINetworkCompletionBlock that will be called in case the MSAIHTTPOperation is not cancelled

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: block of type MSAINetworkCompletionBlock that will be called in case the MSAIHTTPOperation is not cancelled

Parameter.Name: queue
Parameter.Abstract: Dispatch Queue on which the completionBlock will be executed
